properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 7 at 4:40AM AKST until January 9 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 55 below expected. The cold wind
chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to
exposed skin.

* WHERE...Lower Yukon Valley.

* WHEN...9 PM this evening to 6 AM Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to increase this evening
with cold wind chills developing.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST THURSDAY
